data.author: Marcel

changelog.release_notes:
Design:
- New beautiful font Sugo
- Medium battery indicator by default

Functionality:
- Previous data shown when OpenWeatherMap gives no response
- Buzz feedback after settings update
- Additional improvements to configuration
- Hopefully, less crashes

Functionality: 
- Fix release for buggy CloudPebble build process
- Weather conditions languages (DE, ES, FR, SK) 
- Battery gauge colour white when charging 
- Battery gauge colour green when fully charged 

Design: 
- Updated icon with thicker battery gauge Implementation: 
- Weather conditions text improvements

Functionality / design: 
- Fix for Dropbox HTTPS
- Rest of day max / min forecast 
- No unit (C/F) displayed to accommodate max / min values

Design: 
- High contrast time configurable 
- Battery gauge thickness configurable 
- Battery gauge darker green for white scheme 

Implementation: 
- Fahrenheit temperature more precise

Implementation:
- More accurate Fahrenheit conversion

Design:
- Watchface is now configurable

Implementation:
- Configuration page:
-- Weather update interval
-- Weather display units
-- Date / time leading zero

Design:
- More contrasting colour schemes (on user request)
- Shorter high-contrast timeout (before light fades-out) 2900 ms
- Specific initial text when BT disconnected on watchface start
- Add version display on watchface start

Implementation:
- Weather refresh set back to every 15 minutes
- Changes to weather Pebble JS implementation 
- Additional locations in Slovakia abbreviated

Design:
- Flick wrist to trigger high-contrast mode
- New schemes for Pebble Time Black/Red/White
- Battery level gauge in red for Time Red

Implementation:
- Additional location strings trimmed

Implementation:
- Corrected white background colour for Time White

Design:
- Colour scheme according to Pebble make
- Battery gauge shows charge when Time reports sub-10% level
- Colour watchface icon

Implementation:
- Locations are now internationalised (Bruxelles -> Brussels)
- JavaScript location maximumAge zeroed

Design:
- Ready for colour schemes according the Pebble / Time make (coming very soon!)

Implementation:
- Changed weather refresh time to 5 minutes
- Weather refresh can fail 3x before reported

Design:
- Small adjustments to date/time position
- Battery bar uses "scale" background again on Basalt

Implementation:
- Location name abbreviation implemented
- Many location names in Slovak abbreviated
- Few location names in Dutch, French, English abbreviated

Design:
- Battery bar colours finalised

Design:
- Colours set back to basics

Design:
- Colourised for Pebble Time

Implementation: 
- Workaround for faulty JS in iOS Pebble Time application
- Additional strings removed from location names (i.e. "Arrondissement du ", etc.)

Design:
- Padding 'space' removed from date
- Verbose user notification for initial request

Implementation:
- Increased tolerance for connection warning
- Package size reduced

Design:
- Notification in case of communication problems
- Weather update not requested when BT disconnected

Implementation:
- Improved watch-phone communication tracking
- Developer notification text added
- Additional code improvements

Bluetooth:
- Vibrations on connect/disconnect

Implementation:
- Code improvements

Design
- Name changed to Frontpage
- Beautiful battery indicator

data.description:
*Configuration page is out of order. It's being worked on.*

Simple watchface with current weather. It's your personal news of NOW...

★ Rest of day max / min temperature ★
★ Celsius, Fahrenheit, leading zero ★
★ Colours match Pebble make ★
★ Subtle battery level indicator ★
❤︎ Give it a GO, give it a HEART! ❤︎

Main features: time (24h/12h), date (localised), battery level, location, current local weather (localised), bluetooth vibrate notification

Localisation date: English, German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español), French (Français)

Time format (leading zero configurable): 
H:mm/HH:mm (24h)
h:mm/hh:mm (12h)

Date format (leading zero configurable):
ddd d Mmm/ddd dd Mmm (all languages)
dd d. Mmm/dd dd. Mmm (German)

Weather (interval configurable):
Current weather and temperature
Rest of day temperature forecast
Refreshed every 60/30/15/10/5 minutes
Provided by OpenWeathermap.org

Localisation weather: English, German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español), French (Français), Slovak (Slovensky)

By design, date automatically displays in all languages that are officially supported by Pebble watch. (Currently: English, French (Français), German (Deutsch), Spanish (Español)) 
If, in the future, a new official language is added to Pebble watch, date will display correctly in the new language (given the new language is set by the user in the Pebble app (Android or iOS)).
